Title: Womens Geneve Watch in 14k Gold Swiss Quartz Movement
Description: Womens Geneve Watch in 14k Gold Swiss Quartz Movement ITEM DESCRIPTION You will love his astonishing ladies' 21mm x 17mm Geneve Swiss made quartz movement watch! It features a gorgeous oval yellow gold fixed bezel with a gold sunbeam dial, gold luminous tick hour markers and sword hands and a push/pull crown. This delicately designed piece comes complete with a 14K tri-color gold polished and brushed link bracelet and foldover clasp closure all made by the finest Italian craftsmanship. What a truly remarkable piece!ITEM DETAILSItem Number: MBO1133-1Material: 14K Yellow GoldBrand: GeneveMovement: Swiss Made QuartzCase Size: 21mm x 17mmFeatures: 14K Yellow Gold, Hours, MinutesWeight: 24.6gCertificate/Appraisal: YesRetail Appraisal: $2,395Our Price: $949 About Mark Broumand Store Policies Shipping Payment Contact Us Thank you for your interest in our collection of beautiful jewels. Shipping All orders are shipped fully insured through FedEx, 2nd Day Air service. Most orders are processed within one business day. Payment For our United States customers, we prefer PayPal. It is the quickest and one of the most secure methods of payment protecting you and us! You must have a confirmed PayPal address and we can ship to this confirmed address only. We make no exceptions to this policy due to security reasons. If you have questions about confirmed addresses, contact PayPal at 1-800-836-1859 or visit their website www.paypal.com. We can also process your credit card payment directly through our store, over the phone. You can contact us directly for over the phone payments toll free 1-866-676-9676. We also accept bank wire transfers. We prefer all international clients to pay by wire transfer for the quickest service. We do accept credit cards directly through us for international clients as well and the acceptance is subject to address verification.
